casebody.data:
Timm PEDDIE, individually, Appellant,
v.
SPOT DEVICES, INC., a Nevada Corporation; Haws Corporation, a Nevada Corporation; Spot Investments, LLC, a Nevada Company; and John Pettibone, individually, Respondents. No. 72721 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED OCTOBER 02, 2018

AFFIRMED IN PART. REVERSED IN PART. REMAND.
